entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 4.

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 09 January 2023
